name: Oddman
description:
Ready to fight for your life? Oddman is a fast-paced fighting game, where you have to be the last one standing or fall victim to the piranha-infested waters.

Do you have what it takes to defeat all the bosses and top the leaderboard?

The world has been taken over by brutal bosses, they control all the Odd-minions and their families. Now, YOU are the only Oddman left in this world that can help save everyone.

Oddman is a most extraordinary fighter, a swift swipe of your finger and he moves at the speed of light. How many enemies can you take out in a single move? Practise your skills and compete on the daily and global leaderboards!

Or take the fight directly to your friends and battle on one device to be the last one standing.

Win epic treasure chests, collect shiny coins to upgrade your ninja skills, gather better armor and level up your belts to become the best possible fighter.

Game features
• Punch! Punch! Punch! A great ninja warrior never fears! Experience an awesome endless boss fight!
• Challenge your friends in TWO PLAYER MODE on one device!
• Easy to pick up and play, difficult to master. Instant fun.
• Find your favorite funny outfit. Unlock unique characters, belts and powers.

PLEASE NOTE: Oddman is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Developed by Set Snail and published by JoyPac Games 2019
